Ingredients.2: 1 salt and ground black pepper to taste

Ingredients.4: 1 clove garlic, minced, or more to taste

Ingredients.12: 0.25 cup sour cream, or to taste

Directions.1: Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat. Season beef with salt and pepper; cook and stir in the hot skillet until browned, about 5 minutes. Add onion and garlic; cook until onion is translucent, 2 to 3 minutes. Add tomato sauce, beef broth, brown sugar, lemon juice, and Worcestershire sauce. Stir until well mixed.

Directions.2: Add cabbage to the skillet and bring to a simmer. Cover and let simmer until cabbage is tender, about 20 minutes. Serve over rice with a little sour cream.
